name: Transmission Operator Simulator
description:
Originally created January 2018 for the Global Game Jam.

T.O. Simulator is a game where you operate the transmission terminal on a cargo ship in deep space. You have four programmed button response: Yes, No, Threaten, and Haggle. The game is rather incomplete, but is entirely playable.

Programming/Sfx - @smol_jordan
Art - @wisewoodrow
